title: Let’s Cheer On!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukuku..................<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh? What happened? Not in a good mood today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No! We have to cheer at the soccer game today, right!? I have to lend Yohane’s magical powers to the team and empower them before they go to battle. But...... what should I say......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, is that what you’re worried about? Yoshiko-chan, everyone already understands your character, so don’t get too hung up on it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not a character, and it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Right, right. Sorry, sorry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ahhh, what should I say~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What about this? “Bring victory for the fallen angel Yohane!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey, that sounds good......! I’ll go with that, then! You should come up with a little demon line too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Should I play a role today too!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not a role!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
